sentences.en: CHAPTER III DEVELOPMENT OF NEW URBAN AREAS AND REDEVELOPMENT OF EXISTING URBAN AREAS.
sentences.cn: 第三章城市新区开发和旧区改建.

sentences.en: Construction noise is also a particular concern for residents living near redevelopment or new development sites.
sentences.cn: 此外,在重建区或新发展区,对附近居民来说,建筑噪音也是特别令人关注的问题.

sentences.en: Current Boston Redevelopment Authority maps are available at Boston City Hall.
sentences.cn: 现行波士顿再开发局的地图可在波士顿市政厅找到.

sentences.en: For considering the usability and dependability synchronously, the system is convenient for maintaining software redevelopment.
sentences.cn: 该系统同时考虑了可用性 、 可靠性,以便于软件系统的维护、再开发.

sentences.en: In the long run, accelerating the redevelopment of the obsolete areas is the ultimate solution.
sentences.cn: 长远来说, 加快旧区重建是最终解决办法.

sentences.en: New Jiangwan is a redevelopment area after the moving of a military airport.
sentences.cn: 新江湾城是原江湾军用机场搬迁后的土地再开发区域.

sentences.en: Next up in the redevelopment queue was the new Shed End Stand.
sentences.cn: 重建工作的下一步就是新建舒赫特看台.

sentences.en: redevelopment of the city’s downtown area
Some of its agencies have financed the redevelopment of their properties with capital from their staff.
sentences.cn: 一些部门通过向职工筹资,重整旗下的物业.

sentences.en: Steve Coyle , CEO , the AFL - CIO Housing Investment Trust , Former Boston Redevelopment Authority.
sentences.cn: 南加州大学建筑与区域设计系教授.

sentences.en: The conclusions of above researches are applied in practical project of mountain city urban redevelopment.
sentences.cn: 将上述研究的初步成果应用于实际的山地旧城改造项目.

sentences.en: The redevelopment of the Children's Hospital will consolidate its reputation.
sentences.cn: 儿童医院的重建将巩固它的声誉.

sentences.en: The redevelopment of the slum area is well under way.
sentences.cn: 贫民窟的重建工作进展顺利.

sentences.en: This part of the city has been zoned for redevelopment.
sentences.cn: 城市的这一部分已被划为重新开发区.

sentences.en: Your program will come within the general heading of redevelopment.
sentences.cn: 你提出的方案将纳入重建的范畴.

trans.tran_en: the act of redeveloping an area, especially in a city
